name: Fishy Friends
description:
Welcome to Fishy Friends!

Save your fishy partner by preparing foods without their body in it!

Complete orders by finding and returning vegetables to the pans to cook them.

Can you finish all the orders in time to save your partner?

By Cameron C (Design+Implementation) + Jamie F (Audio)

btw if you get to the end, sorry you wont have mouse control to click replay cos i goofed up. Sorry! <3
